mapper.select: select * from qna order by QNA_NO asc
select * from qna WHERE QNA_NO=#{QNA_NO} order by QNA_NO asc
mapper.insert: insert into qna (QNA_NO, QNA_NAME, QNA_TYPE, QNA_PHONE, QNA_CONTEXT, QNA_TITLE) VALUES ((select nvl(max(QNA_NO), 0 ) +1 from QNA), #{QNA_TYPE}, #{QNA_NAME}, #{QNA_PHONE}, #{QNA_CONTEXT}, #{QNA_TITLE})
